title: 72A.15 PENALTY FOR VIOLATION OF LAW PROVIDING FOR INSURANCE IN UNLICENSED COMPANIES.
text: Every person licensed to procure insurance in an unlicensed foreign company who fails to file the affidavit and statement required in such case or who willfully makes a false affidavit or statement shall forfeit the license and be guilty, for the first offense, of a misdemeanor, and for each subsequent offense, of a gross misdemeanor.
